name: Capital Partners Group
overview:
Capital Partners Investment Bank (which comprises a Corporate Finance arm and a Capital Markets arm) focuses on mid-market transactions which are usually uneconomical for large investment banks. We bring a group of experienced Investment Bankers together with leading online platforms.

Capital Partners Venture Capital is a post-bubble firm launched after the collapse of the stocks markets in March 2000. Capital Partners Ventures (www.CapitalPartnersVentures.com) is part of Capital Partners Group, which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Services Authority (FSA) in the UK.
